entry.def: The inheritors of something such as a tradition are the people who live or arrive after it has been established and are able to benefit from it.

example.ex: ...the proud inheritors of the Prussian military tradition.
example.tran: 普鲁士军事传统的自豪的继承者

entry.def: An inheritor is someone who inherits money or property from someone who has died.

example.ex: Two-thirds of inheritors promptly sold the houses they were left.
example.tran: 三分之二的继承人会把他们继承得到的房产迅速变卖。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is entitled by law or by the terms of a will to inherit the estate of another
